And it's important, for example, that we are all subject in the United States to the Patriot Act and it is possible that all that information could be made available to the authorities. Eric Schmidt 's remarks about the availability of search data to law enforcement demands have been seized on by privacy advocates as evidence of overall disregard for privacy on the part of both Eric Schmidt and Google.
